sentences.sentence: These are some of the devastating effects of the floods in the Emilia-Romagna region in northern Italy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Alongside Prime Minister Giorgia Maloney, European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen saw the damage first-hand and offered her support to the victims.

As stated by EU Commission President von der Leyen the EU will remain by Italy's side during the emergency and EU Commission President von der Leyen also confirmed that the EU will provide financial help to support the country as it deals with the emergency. But given that extreme weather events like this one are becoming more frequent in Europe, the EU will have to deal with them not just in Italy, but in other parts of Europe too.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Germany's economy is technically in recession after shrinking for a second successive quarter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Data released by the Federal Statistical Office shows gross domestic product declined by 0.3% between January and March.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This follows a decline of 0.5% in the last three months of 2022 in Europe's biggest economy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The figures also reveal employment rose in this year's opening quarter when inflation eased.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But this hasn't prevented the country from tipping into what most economists define as a recession.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Tributes have poured in from the world of rock and roll and beyond following the announcement of Tina Turner's death at the age of 83. Turner initially found fame in a turbulent and abusive

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: musical partnership with her husband Ike Turner, but later became one of the biggest acts in the world as a solo artist and one of the defining pop icons of the 1980s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Elton John said Turner was a total legend on record and on stage and he added, we have lost one of the world's most exciting and electric performers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Mick Jagger who duetted with Turner during Live Aid in 1985, wrote, I'm so saddened by the passing of my wonderful friend Tina Turner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: She was truly an enormously talented performer and singer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Even former US President Barack Obama tweeted she was powerful, unstoppable and unapologetically herself.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Fellow female singers, including Debbie Harry of Blondie, expressed feelings of gratitude for Turner's trailblazing as a woman in a tough and often discriminatory world of music.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In the 1960s with her husband, they produced groundbreaking hits such as Proud Mary, River Deep, Mountain High.

sentences.sentence: And then later as a solo artist, Tina gifted us songs like The Best and What's Love Got To Do With It.
